# Colony Roleplay Standards You do not have rules of engagement and may free fire at and be hostile to Government Forces and/or CLF forces if: - You have not surrendered. - You have not willingly accepted medical aid from the them.\nYou may attempt to escape without combat and resume hostile activities when out of sight.
[bold]Exceptions[/bold] - If captured, you may attempt to start a prison riot when in their brig or prison, to escape and resume hostile intentions. This does not require permission.
- [color=#ff0000]Attacking newly spawned players in cryo/spawns is forbidden, let them have a chance to gear up before you attack them![/color]
